(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT This) (NN shop))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADJP (JJ closed))
      (SBAR
        (WHADVP (WRB When))
        (S
          (NP (PRP I))
          (VP (VBD was)
            (ADVP (RB just))
            (NP
              (NP (DT a) (NN kid))
              (SBAR
                (S
                  (NP (PRP I))
                  (VP (VBD remembered)
                    (S
                      (VP (VBG going)
                        (PP (TO to)
                          (NP (DT the) (NN neighborhood)))
                        (NP
                          (NP (`` ``)
                            (NP (NNP Kek) (NNP Huay) (NNP Tiam))
                            ('' '')
                            (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
                              (NP (NNP Grocery) (NNP Store))
                              (-RRB- -RRB-)))
                          (SBAR
                            (S
                              (VP (TO to)
                                (VP (VB buy)
                                  (NP
                                    (NP (DT a) (NN can))
                                    (PP (IN of)
                                      (NP (NNS sausages)))))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


det(shop-2, This-1)
nsubj(closed-4, shop-2)
cop(closed-4, is-3)
root(ROOT-0, closed-4)
advmod(kid-10, When-5)
nsubj(kid-10, I-6)
cop(kid-10, was-7)
advmod(kid-10, just-8)
det(kid-10, a-9)
advcl(closed-4, kid-10)
nsubj(remembered-12, I-11)
rcmod(kid-10, remembered-12)
xcomp(remembered-12, going-13)
prep(going-13, to-14)
det(neighborhood-16, the-15)
pobj(to-14, neighborhood-16)
nn(Tiam-20, Kek-18)
nn(Tiam-20, Huay-19)
dobj(going-13, Tiam-20)
nn(Store-24, Grocery-23)
appos(Tiam-20, Store-24)
aux(buy-27, to-26)
infmod(Tiam-20, buy-27)
det(can-29, a-28)
dobj(buy-27, can-29)
prep(can-29, of-30)
pobj(of-30, sausages-31)

  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD had)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB repeat)
            (NP (DT the) (NN word) (NN sausage))
            (SBAR
              (NP (CD three) (NNS times))
              (IN before)
              (S
                (NP (DT the) (NN lady))
                (VP
                  (VP (VBD got)
                    (NP (DT the) (NN message)))
                  (CC and)
                  (VP (VBD blurted)
                    (PP (IN out) (`` ``)
                      (NP (NNP Orh)))))))))))
    (, ,)))

    (VP (VBZ makes)
      (NP
        (NP (PRP$ his) (JJ own) (NN variety))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (JJ cold) (NNS cuts)))))
    (. .)))

prep(pic-16, above-17)

  (S
    (NP (NNS Sausages))

      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (DT this) (NN way))
          (VP (VBZ is)
            (VP (VBN deemed)
              (UCP
                (VP (VBN cooked))
                (CC and)
                (ADJP (JJ ready)
                  (S
                    (VP (TO to)
                      (VP (VB be)
                        (VP (VBN eaten))))))))))))
    (. !)))

  (NP
    (NP (CD six)
      (NP (NN milestones) ('' ''))

          (S
            (NP (PRP you))
